wikipedia_page.main: Richard Beresford (12 August 1869 – 12 July 1941) was an English cricketer. He played seven first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club between 1889 and 1891.

response: Richard Beresford (June 3, 1755 – February 6, 1803) was an American planter and lawyer from Berkeley County, South Carolina. He was a delegate for South Carolina in the Confederation Congress in 1783 and 1784.
